name: Tackle
description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target.

name: Ember
description: A basic fire attack that may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Water Gun
description: A basic water attack that shoots water at the target.

name: Vine Whip
description: A physical attack in which the user strikes the target with vines.

name: Scratch
description: A physical attack in which the user scratches the target with sharp claws.

name: Quick Attack
description: A quick physical attack that allows the user to strike first.

name: Absorb
description: A Grass-type attack that drains the target's energy and restores the user's HP.

name: Rock Throw
description: A physical attack in which the user throws a rock at the target.

name: Rock Tomb
description: A Rock-type attack that may lower the target's Speed.

name: Outrage
description: A powerful Dragon-type attack that causes the user to become confused afterward.

name: Dragon Claw
description: A physical attack in which the user slashes the target with sharp claws.

name: Earthquake
description: A powerful Ground-type attack that causes a massive tremor.

name: Metal Claw
description: A physical attack in which the user slashes the target with sharp metal claws.

name: Meteor Mash
description: A powerful Steel-type attack that may raise the user's Attack.

name: Bullet Punch
description: A quick Steel-type attack that allows the user to strike first.

name: Zen Headbutt
description: A physical Psychic-type attack that may cause the target to flinch.
